title.rendered: EHR & EMR integration for a mental health portal

<title>EMR & EHR Integration Solution for a Mental Health Portal — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="ITRex performed expert EMR and EHR integration services, syncing a custom physician portal for mental health professionals with an array of healthcare IT systems. For this, we used the Redox EHR integration APIs. Learn more about this project." />
